text.text_translated:
Bruce Springsteen sells many albums. He is a best-selling artist.
He is different from other artists.
He still makes new music.
His new music goes to number one.
His shows fill stadiums.
He is in his late 60s.
But he is still the best.
This does not surprise me.
He tells us our most important stories.
These stories are about us.
Listen to his song "Born in the USA".
These stories are still important today, just like before.

feedback.feedback: PASS: All A2 readability standards have been met. The text is factually accurate, preserves the core meaning and fidelity of the original, and is correctly classified as A2 by the CEFR classifier. The vocabulary is appropriate for A2, and the sentence structures are consistently short and simple, using only approved A2 connectors. This is a well-executed simplification.
